stateOfCharge.title: State of charge
stateOfCharge.tooltip: Displays the current battery percentage on the robot. When the battery reaches 25%, the robot will automatically shut down to prevent any damage from sudden shutdowns.

voltage.title: Voltage
voltage.tooltip: Shows the battery voltage in Volts (V). During normal operation, the battery voltage will range between 49.2V and 38.4V.

current.title: Current
current.tooltip: Shows the battery current in Ampers (A). During normal operation, the battery current will range between 60A and -80A.

diskUsage.title: Disk usage
diskUsage.tooltip: Shows the amount of space used on the robot’s internal storage.

ssdUsage.title: SSD usage
ssdUsage.tooltip: Shows the amount of space used on the robot’s SSD.
